# Five.py

[![Latest Version][1]][2]
[![Build Status][3]][4]
[![Coverage Status][5]][6]

A library to overcomplicate 5. It's a python port of the javascript [five][].


## Install

    $ pip install five


## Usage

```python
from five import Five
five = Five()
```

### Basic 5
```python
five()  # 5
```

### Addition
```python
five() + five()  # 10
```

### Multiplication
```python
five() * five()  # 25
```

### Division
```python
five() / five()  # 1
```

### Different sorts of 5
```python
five.up_high()  # ‚Åµ
five.down_low()  # ‚ÇÖ
five.too_slow()  # 5, with a 555-millisecond delay
five.roman()  # V
five.morse_code()  # di-di-di-di-dah
five.negative()  # -5
five.loud()  # FIVE
five.loud('piglatin')  # IVEFAY
five.smooth()  # S
```

### 5 goes multilingual
```python
five.arabic()  # ÿÆŸÖÿ≥ÿ©
five.azerbaijani()  # be≈ü
five.basque()  # bost
five.belarusian  # –ø—è—Ü—å
five.bosnian()  # pet
five.bulgarian()  # –ø–µ—Ç
five.catalan()  # cinc
five.chinese()  # ‰∫î
five.choctaw()  # tahlapi
five.croatian()  # pet
five.czech()  # pƒõt
five.dovah()  # hen
five.dutch()  # vijf
five.elvish()  # lempe
five.english()  # Five
five.estonian()  # viis
five.finnish()  # viisi
five.french()  # cinq
five.german()  # f√ºnf
five.greek()  # œÄŒ≠ŒΩœÑŒµ
five.hebrew()  # ◊ó◊û◊©
five.hindi()  # ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö
five.hungarian()  # √∂t
five.indonesian()  # lima
five.irish()  # c√∫ig
five.italian()  # cinque
five.japanese()  # ‰∫î
five.kannada()  # ‡≤ê‡≤¶‡≥Å
five.klingon()  # vagh
five.korean()  # Ïò§
five.latin()  # quinque
five.latvian()  # pieci
five.lithuanian()  # penki
five.mongolian()  # —Ç–∞–≤–∞–Ω
five.norwegian()  # fem
five.persian()  # ŸæŸÜÿ¨
five.piglatin()  # ivefay
five.polish()  # piƒôƒá
five.portuguese()  # cinco
five.romanian()  # cinci
five.russian()  # –ø—è—Ç—å
five.serbian()  # pet
five.slovakian()  # p√§≈•
five.slovenian()  # pet
five.spanish()  # cinco
five.swedish()  # fem
five.tamil()  # ‡Æê‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡ØÅ
five.telugu()  # ‡∞ê‡∞¶‡±Å
five.thai()  # ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≤
five.turkish()  # be≈ü
five.ukrainian()  # –ø‚Äô—è—Ç—å
five.welsh()  # pump
```

### Different radices
```python
five.binary()  # 101
five.octal()  # 5
five.hex()  # 5
```

### Map and Reduce
```python
five.map([1, 2, 3])  # [5, 5, 5]
five.reduce([1, 2, 3])  # 5
```

### Novelty
```python
five.fab()  # ['Juwan Howard','Ray Jackson','Jimmy King','Jalen Rose','Chris Webber']
five.jackson()  # ['Jackie','Tito','Jermaine','Marlon','Michael']
```

### Rotation
```python
five.rotate("five.py")  #knaj.ud
```

### Unicode
```python
five.oclock()  # 'üïî'
```

## Development

run the tests:

    $ pip install -r dev-requirements.txt
    $ invoke test

## Credits

All the glories should belong to [@jackdcrawford][], I just port it to python :)
